content: 2rd 3rd and 4th sets of decreases are completed after the subsequent 7 rounds ● four stitches are decreased on each decrease round ● 7 rounds are worked after the last set of decreases ● this is when additional length may be added to the mitten if desired ~ work the following rounds rounds 1 - 55 knit round 56 decrease round *k14 15 16 ssk* repeat 4 times 60 64 68 sts remain rounds 57 - 63 knit all stitches for 7 rounds round 64 decrease round *k13 14 15 ssk* repeat 4 times 56 60 64 sts remain rounds 65 - 71 knit all stitches for 7 rounds round 72 decrease round *k12 13 14 ssk* repeat 4 times 52 56 60 sts remain rounds 73 - 79 knit all stitches for 7 rounds round 80 decrease round *k11 12 13 ssk* repeat 4 times 48 52 56 sts remain rounds 81 - 87 knit all stitches for 7 rounds ~ the mitten measures roughly 9 from cast on edge ~ optional to make mitten longer work additional rounds on the 48 52 56 sts prior to the wrist section try it on to ensure an optional fit ~ cut the mc leaving a 8 tail this color will not be used again until the hand section ~ continue to the striped cuff and wrist section striped cuff and wrist notations ● once the color ends cut the yarn leaving a 8 tail for weaving purposes ● rounds 9 through 16 create the wrist section ● contrast colors 1 2 & 3 are utilized for the striped section ● cc 3 takes you into the gusset where cc4 gives a bit of a pop of color and creates the moss stitch ● the wrist instructions end on round 26 then the thumb gusset starts with cc3 and thumb gusset round 1 ~ work the following rounds striped cuff round 1 *with cc1 k1 slip 1* repeat between * s to the end of the round striped cuff round 2 - 5 4 rounds with cc1 knit every stitch striped cuff round 6 *with cc2 k1 slip 1* repeat between * s to the end of the round striped cuff round 7 & 8 with cc2 knit every stitch striped wrist round 9 - 16 8 rounds with cc2 *k2 x p2* repeat 12 13 14 times striped cuff round 17 & 18 with cc2 knit every stitch striped cuff round 19 *with cc1 k1 slip 1* repeat between * s to the end of the round striped cuff round 20 - 23 4 rounds with cc1 knit every stitch striped cuff round 24 *with cc3 k1 slip 1* repeat between * s to the end of the round striped cuff round 25 & 26 with cc3 knit every stitch ~ the mitten will measure roughly 11 from cast on ~ continue to the thumb gusset section thumb gusset notations ● thumb increases m1 are made one stitch in
